text:
Today:
• added a progress tab (one we’ve seen before) to the settings screens
• explored some variation of the completed dx screens and date pickers
• also explored variations of the full screen take over for completed dx and completed session screens
WIP:
• rating dx screens
• dx library
• working to make the full screen completed dx feel different but more special than the full screen completed session
• smooth transition from completed dx to rating dx
